description: Component that displays a loading spinner and message.

hasBackground.description: Defines whether gray background should be displayed. Default to false (background hidden).

inline.description: Define if spinner should be shown inline without any default padding and margin. Default to false (show default padding and margin).

loaderSize.description: The size of the loading indicator. Defaults to 'md'.

showDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before the loading indicator display. Default to 0.

text.description: The text to display under the loading indicator.
